alert.note: Alert for Archer; Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 10:46PM CDT until August 10 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Archer County in northern Texas... Southern Wichita County in northern Texas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1045 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mankins, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wichita Falls, Archer City, Holliday, Scotland, Windthorst, Dundee, Mankins, Lake Kickapoo, northeastern Lake Diversion, Lakeside City, and Pleasant Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
